title: Bug 4329: No results when searched via Package view selection and dialog (1GLDN1X)
description: Bug 4329: No results when searched via Package view selection and dialog (1GLDN1X)
OB: When searching via the Package view selection and dialog, no results are displayed.
EB: When searching via the Package view selection and dialog, the expected behavior is for relevant results to be displayed.
SR:
To reproduce the issue: 
1. Open the Package view
2. Select a package
3. Right-click on the package and choose 'Search' from the context menu
4. In the search dialog, enter a search term
5. Click on the 'Search' button
6. Verify that no results are displayed
